titleStmt.title: Commune concilium tentum die veneris primo die Iunij, anno Regni Regis Henrici octaui, &c. decimo octauo in præsentia Iohannis Allen Maioris, Gulielmi Butler militis, Iohannis Milborne militis, ... At this common councell, it is agreed, granted, ordained, and enacted, that if hereafter any free-man or freewoman of this citie, take any apprentice, ...
Acts and orders. 1526
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

titleStmt.title: Commune concilium tentum die veneris primo die Iunij, anno Regni Regis Henrici octaui, &c. decimo octauo in præsentia Iohannis Allen Maioris, Gulielmi Butler militis, Iohannis Milborne militis, ... At this common councell, it is agreed, granted, ordained, and enacted, that if hereafter any free-man or freewoman of this citie, take any apprentice, ...
Acts and orders. 1526
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by VVilliam Iaggard, printer to the Honourable Citie of London,

notesStmt.note: An act regarding the freeing of apprentices before their terms expire. 1 June 1526; see also STC 16708.5--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
